d <- googlesheets4::read_sheet(sched_gsheet, "lab2_pts")

md2html <- function(x){
  markdown::markdownToHTML(text = x, fragment.only=T) %>%
    str_replace("^(<p>)(.*)(</p>)\\n$", "\\2")}

# d_0 <- d # d <- d_0
d <- d %>%
  mutate(
    Lab  = map_chr(Lab, md2html),
    Item = map_chr(Item, md2html)) %>% 
  select(`#`, Lab, Item, Pts=Points)

datatable(d, rownames = F, escape = F)
